Title: Breaking Point
Plot: Paddy wakes up to find himself chained to a bed in a strange room, unable to remember how he got there, and tension arises between Frank and Monica following a DSS investigation. Carl schemes to discover Micky's sexuality, Tom's last-ditch romantic gesture to regain Debbie's affection backfires, and Carrie decides it is time for a change
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
